  • Uses of Order in Onlinehandel.app

    Fields in Onlinehandel.app with type parameters of type Order
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private static java.util.List<Order> Main.deliveries  
    Method parameters in Onlinehandel.app with type arguments of type Order
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static int Main.export​(java.util.Collection<Order> deliveries, String filename)
    Saves several orders to file.
    static void Main.print​(java.util.Collection<Order> deliveries)
    Prints orders line by line.

    Adds a short header before printing the String representation of all deliveries line by line.

  • Uses of Order in Onlinehandel.entities

    Subclasses of Order in Onlinehandel.entities
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  InterationalOrder
    An international order within the Onlinehandel.

    For international orders a factor can be set that is used to calculate customs when crossing borders.

    This factor is applied to the items' total value when calculating the total of an international order.
    class  RegionalOrder
    A regional order within the Onlinehandel.

    For regional orders an express option can be set.
    Methods in Onlinehandel.entities with parameters of type Order
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    int Order.compareTo​(Order arg0)
    Implements natural ordering by id for orders.
    Constructors in Onlinehandel.entities with parameters of type Order
    Constructor Description
    Order​(Order orig)
    Copies an order.
    The new order is a deep copy of the original.

  • Uses of Order in Onlinehandel.util

    Methods in Onlinehandel.util with parameters of type Order
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean OnRouteMatcher.matches​(Order t)
    Tests if an order is currently on route.
    An order is on route if and only if it is collected and not yet delivered.
